title: No Letting Go
writer: Jonathan D. Bucari (screenplay), Randi Silverman (screenplay), Jonathan D. Bucari (based on a short film by)
actors: Cheryl Allison, Richard Burgi, David Schallipp, Noah Silverman
plot: Based on the multi-award winning short film Illness (2013), No Letting Go (2015) follows the story of the Spencer family whose middle son, Timothy, struggles with anxiety, depression and mood disorder. As his symptoms become more and more debilitating, his parents are faced with painfully difficult choices that will change their lives forever.
